UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Short, Synthetic Cationic Peptides Have Antibacterial Activity against Mycobacterium smegmatis by Forming Pores in Membrane and Synergizing with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Gupta K, Singh S, van Hoek ML

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12(EC50=1.5µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(EC50=0.36µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=62.6µg/ml)
